name: Disco Alive
description:
Keep Disco Alive! Keep the Party going!

!!!WARNING TO STREAMERS!!!

The game's theme was inspired by the disco song Stay Alive, therefore I decide to make my own mixtape it has copyrighted music.

*Color blind friendly (Hopefully... or I wasted too much time)

Controls

  • mouse
  •  Drop and drag Dice
  •  Shake Dice to Roll
  • keep your points above the goal

*Post LD quality of life changes (WEB Build Only)

  • Improved tutorial clarity
  • Ui changes (Fill Bar Color, moved discoBall to centre, restart button, show high score)
  • Balanced points system
  • Shorter Rounds

Goodluck have fun!!!

Feedback is appreciated
let me know what was your high score
